config: As a valued Justia Client, we're thrilled to offer you a FREE TRIAL to experience our Justia Connect Pro Membership.

How does it work?
Upgrade now and start your complimentary trial. During your trial, you can experience all the exclusive benefits of being a Justia Connect Pro member, including a $200 credit that can be applied to one of the selected services you have with Justia.

Once your free trial ends, we'll charge you for the Justia Connect Pro Membership ($199.80)* and then automatically apply your $200 credit towards your chosen Justia service, essentially making your membership free!
To take advantage of the free trial

description: A Justia Connect Pro Badge for your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile page.
The opportunity to feature your best client and peer reviews on your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile.

config: Don't miss the opportunity to take advantage of your free trial!
If you have any questions about Justia Connect Pro, please feel free to call us at (888) 587-8421 or contact us at support.justia.com
*Based on annual pricing; please note that at the end of the trial period, your credit card will be charged the subscription fee unless you choose to cancel your subscription beforehand.
